sourcesContent:
Selecione um ou mais arquivos XML para a mineração de dados.
{{file.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-input-mult-files', templateUrl: './input-mult-files.component.html', styleUrls: ['./input-mult-files.component.scss'], }) export class InputMultFilesComponent { files: Array = []; xmlInputChangeHandler(fileInputEvent: any) { this.files = fileInputEvent.target.files; console.log(this.files); } fileRemoveClickHandler(file: Object) { console.log(file); } } export interface XmlFile { name: string; size: bigint; type: string; file: any; }
